DOC.brief_summary: This study compare intranasal dexmedetomidine intranasal fentanyl follow anesthesia induction patient undergo myringotomy placement pressure equalization ( PE ) tube provide analgesia smooth emergence general anesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: Dexmedetomidine Versus Fentanyl Following Pressure Equalization Tube Placement
DOC.criteria: functional status assign American Society Anesthesiology ( ASA ) classification I II ( minimal comorbid disease ) patient schedule placement bilateral myringotomy tubes history allergy either dexmedetomidine fentanyl concomitant use medication may exaggerate HR response dexmedetomidine include digoxin Î²adrenergic antagonist .
